title: x/build/misc/dashboard/app: should be easier to hack on
body:
The build.golang.org App Engine app in misc/dashboard/app doesn't start up.

Running dev_appserver.py in that directory and hitting it just yields an error:

"tag not found: tip"

No README or init scripts or anything.

It should be more hackable, at least when in appengine.IsDevServer() mode, auto-initing.
